document.full_text: doctors were unable to prevent atlanta braves minor league manager luis salazar from losing an eye after being knocked unconscious by a foul ball one week ago, the national league team said on wednesday.
document.title: braves minor league manager salazar loses eye in mishap
lines_and_colors: doctors were unable to prevent atlanta braves minor league manager luis salazar from losing an eye after being knocked unconscious by a foul ball one week ago, the national league team said on wednesday.
